description.en: Haiku 4.5 doesn't replace Sonnet—it complements it. Discover the new workflow that combines both models to maximize efficiency and minimize costs in Claude Code.
description.es: Haiku 4.5 no reemplaza a Sonnet—lo complementa. Descubre el nuevo flujo de trabajo que combina ambos modelos para maximizar eficiencia y minimizar costos en Claude Code.
